about_the_game:
Detective Pinkerton: The Norma Case is a "point & click" adventure game.

"Norma" immerses you in the role of private detective Augustus Pinkerton.
The game takes place in June 2240, your mission is to unravel the mystery surrounding the disappearance of Norma X, a 19-year-old young woman.

Here are some key points of the game to help you understand what awaits you:

Point & Click : The game is designed in a "point & click" style, meaning you will explore environments by clicking to interact with objects and characters.
Playable with mouse/keyboard or xbox joypad.
Your adventure can be saved and reloaded at any time.

Total Immersion through Voice Acting : All dialogues are fully voiced in French, offering total immersion in the story. Additionally, texts are available in both French and English, making it easier for English-speaking players to understand.

Carefully Crafted Soundscape : Each level is accompanied by its own music and sound effects, enhancing the game's immersion and atmosphere.
The soundtrack helps create a rich and dynamic gaming experience, suited to each stage of your investigation.

Voxel Universe : Norma takes place in environments entirely created in voxel. Voxels are 3D building units, similar to pixels on a 2D screen.
This unique artistic style gives the game a distinctive and attractive aesthetic, reminiscent of both retro games and modern creations.

Prepare to dive into an investigation full of mysteries and surprises with detective Augustus Pinkerton and his partner Hilda!

Norma in Numbers:

  • Over 800 dialogues in French

  • 20 NPCs

  • More than 1200 lines of text

  • Gallery and secrets to unlock

  • Achievements to collect

  • 3 years of development

highlighted.name: A professor who doesn't just mean well...
Find all the parts of Hilda

content_descriptors.notes: Contains representations of sex toys such as dolls, but all in humorous voxel form.
